Job Description:
Job Information 
We are building amazing new cloud based products for the healthcare industry and want to hire people who have the same kind of passion and energy that we share here at cloudchowk. 
cloudchowk is a dedicated team of serious programmers who know how to balance coding and fun very well,  for us quality is everything. 
We aim to have a friendly environment in our office without any kind of stupid politics which we believe only hinders innovation and growth. 
Industry: IT Software/ Product Development
Role: Software Developer
Key skills: MVC | ASP. NET | C# | WCF | MS SQL | jQuery,  Angular | AJAX
Education: B. Tech/ B. E.  - Computers
and/ or M. Tech/ M. Sc/ MCA - Computers
You will be working in a team but you should be self sufficient as well.  cloudchowk is an open place where ideas can be exchanged without hesitation and therefore you will always get the platform to express yourself without being afraid of any kind of bureaucracy. 
Kind of stuff we would like you to know before you apply at cloudchowk:

ASP. NET C# 4. 5
MVC 5
WCF
MS SQL Server
jQuery,  Angular
AJAX
HTML5
